text: khāṟūn paṟaññu: enṟe kaivaśamuḷḷa vidyakeāṇṭ mātramāṇ enikkitu labhiccat‌. ennāl avannu mump avanēkkāḷ kaṭutta śaktiyuḷḷavaruṁ, kūṭutal saṅghabalamuḷḷavarumāyirunna talamuṟakaḷe allāhu naśippicciṭṭuṇṭenn avan manas'silākkiyiṭṭillē? taṅṅaḷuṭe pāpaṅṅaḷe paṟṟi kuṟṟavāḷikaḷēāṭ anvēṣikkappeṭunnatalla
